alfredsnippet.snippet:
Hi,

Thank you for verifying yourself with Candour. Here are your login credentials:

Your username: XXX
Your email: XXX
Temporary password: XXX

To activate your account, please log in to SelfService and follow the instructions.
https://selfservice.abo.fi/

For more information on when to use your username and when to use your e-mail address, please read the following:
https://abofi.sharepoint.com/sites/intra-en-ict/SitePages/User-ID.aspx

If you have technical questions, have a look at the guides sections here:
https://abofi.sharepoint.com/sites/intra-en-ict/SitePages/Guides.aspx

I wish you happy studies at Åbo Akademi University!

Kind regards,
– Andreas Näsman
ICT Services
Åbo Akademi University
alfredsnippet.name: Login credentials
